text:
State Service (Restructuring) Order 2016

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 11 of the State Service Act 2000 .

13 June 2016

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

WILLIAM E. F. HODGMAN

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the State Service (Restructuring) Order 2016 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2016.

3. Amalgamation
    The Poppy Advisory and Control Board, part of the Department of Justice, is amalgamated with the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 22 June 2016

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
